dialogues.speaker: Friend
dialogues.text: I'm good, thanks for asking! How about you?

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: I'm doing great too. By the way, have you watched the new movie?

dialogues.speaker: Friend
dialogues.text: Yes, I watched it last night. It was amazing!

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: That's awesome! I'm planning to watch it this weekend.
